raw: {"epics": [{"id": "EPIC-1", "title": "Task Management Core Functionality", "description": "Develop the core features of the To-Do List application, enabling users to add, edit, mark as completed, and delete tasks. This epic is critical to delivering the primary business value: allowing users to manage daily tasks efficiently.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 80, "status": "To Do", "stories": [{"id": "FE-1", "title": "Add New Task", "description": "As a user, I want to add a new task with a title and optional description so that I can keep track of things I need to do.", "acceptance_criteria": ["User can enter a task title (required) and description (optional)", "Task is added to the list upon submission", "Input fields are cleared after adding", "Error shown if title is empty"], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 10, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "FE-1-1", "title": "Design Add Task UI", "description": "Create UI components for task input fields and add button.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-1-2", "title": "Implement Add Task Logic (Frontend)", "description": "Handle form submission, validation, and state update for new tasks.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-1-1", "title": "Implement Add Task API (Backend)", "description": "Create backend endpoint to accept new task data and store it.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-1-1", "title": "Test Add Task Functionality", "description": "Write and execute test cases for adding tasks, including edge cases.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "FE-2", "title": "Edit Task", "description": "As a user, I want to edit the title and description of an existing task so I can update my tasks as needed.", "acceptance_criteria": ["User can open an edit form for any task", "User can update title and description", "Changes are saved and reflected in the list", "Error shown if title is empty"], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 10, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "FE-2-1", "title": "Design Edit Task UI", "description": "Create UI for editing task details inline or in a modal.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-2-2", "title": "Implement Edit Task Logic (Frontend)", "description": "Handle edit form state, validation, and update logic.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-2-1", "title": "Implement Edit Task API (Backend)", "description": "Create backend endpoint to update task details.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-2-1", "title": "Test Edit Task Functionality", "description": "Write and execute test cases for editing tasks.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "FE-3", "title": "Mark Task as Completed", "description": "As a user, I want to mark a task as completed so I can track my progress.", "acceptance_criteria": ["User can mark any task as completed", "Completed tasks are visually distinct", "User can unmark a completed task"], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "FE-3-1", "title": "Design Completed Task UI", "description": "Update task list UI to visually distinguish completed tasks.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-3-2", "title": "Implement Complete/Uncomplete Logic (Frontend)", "description": "Handle toggling of completed state for tasks.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-3-1", "title": "Implement Complete/Uncomplete Task API (Backend)", "description": "Create backend endpoint to update task completion status.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-3-1", "title": "Test Mark as Completed Functionality", "description": "Write and execute test cases for marking tasks as completed and uncompleted.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "FE-4", "title": "Delete Task", "description": "As a user, I want to delete a task so I can remove tasks I no longer need.", "acceptance_criteria": ["User can delete any task", "Deleted task is removed from the list", "Confirmation prompt before deletion"], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "FE-4-1", "title": "Design Delete Task UI", "description": "Add delete button and confirmation prompt to task items.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-4-2", "title": "Implement Delete Task Logic (Frontend)", "description": "Handle delete action and update UI state.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-4-1", "title": "Implement Delete Task API (Backend)", "description": "Create backend endpoint to delete a task.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-4-1", "title": "Test Delete Task Functionality", "description": "Write and execute test cases for deleting tasks.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}]}, {"id": "EPIC-2", "title": "Task List Display & User Experience", "description": "Design and implement the user interface for displaying all tasks in a list, ensuring a simple, intuitive, and responsive experience across desktop and mobile browsers. This epic supports user engagement and satisfaction.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 40, "status": "To Do", "stories": [{"id": "FE-5", "title": "Display All Tasks in a List", "description": "As a user, I want to see all my tasks in a single list so I can easily review and manage them.", "acceptance_criteria": ["All tasks are displayed in a scrollable list", "Each task shows title, description, and completion status", "List updates in real-time as tasks are added, edited, completed, or deleted"], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "FE-5-1", "title": "Design Task List UI", "description": "Create wireframes and UI components for the task list.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-5-2", "title": "Implement Task List Rendering", "description": "Develop frontend logic to render tasks dynamically.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-5-1", "title": "Test Task List Display", "description": "Write and execute test cases for task list rendering and updates.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "UX-1", "title": "Responsive Design for Desktop and Mobile", "description": "As a user, I want the app to work seamlessly on both desktop and mobile browsers so I can manage tasks from any device.", "acceptance_criteria": ["UI adapts to different screen sizes", "All features accessible and usable on mobile", "No horizontal scrolling required"], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "UX-1-1", "title": "Design Responsive Layout", "description": "Create responsive wireframes and style guides.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-6-1", "title": "Implement Responsive Styles", "description": "Apply CSS and frontend logic for responsive design.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 4, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-6-1", "title": "Test Responsiveness", "description": "Test app on various devices and browsers.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "UX-2", "title": "User Experience & Accessibility Enhancements", "description": "As a user, I want the app to be easy to use and accessible so that everyone can manage their tasks efficiently.", "acceptance_criteria": ["Keyboard navigation supported", "Color contrast meets accessibility standards", "Clear focus indicators on interactive elements"], "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "UX-2-1", "title": "Accessibility Audit", "description": "Review UI for accessibility compliance.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-7-1", "title": "Implement Accessibility Improvements", "description": "Update UI components for accessibility (ARIA, focus, contrast).", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 4, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-7-1", "title": "Accessibility Testing", "description": "Test app for accessibility using tools and manual checks.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "PM-1", "title": "User Feedback & Iteration", "description": "As a product manager, I want to gather user feedback on the UI/UX and iterate on the design to improve usability.", "acceptance_criteria": ["Collect feedback from at least 5 users", "Identify and prioritize top 3 usability issues", "Implement at least 2 improvements based on feedback"], "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "PM-1-1", "title": "Conduct User Testing", "description": "Organize and run user testing sessions.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "PM-1-2", "title": "Analyze Feedback", "description": "Review and synthesize user feedback.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-8-1", "title": "Implement UI/UX Improvements", "description": "Make prioritized changes to UI/UX based on feedback.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}]}]}, {"id": "EPIC-3", "title": "Performance, Quality Assurance, and Deployment", "description": "Ensure the To-Do List application loads within 3 seconds, is robustly tested, and is deployed for public access. This epic is essential for meeting technical requirements and delivering a reliable product.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 40, "status": "To Do", "stories": [{"id": "DEVOPS-1", "title": "Setup CI/CD Pipeline", "description": "As a developer, I want automated build, test, and deployment pipelines so that releases are fast and reliable.", "acceptance_criteria": ["Automated build and test on every commit", "Automated deployment to staging and production", "Rollback support in case of failure"], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "DEVOPS-1-1", "title": "Configure CI/CD Tools", "description": "Set up tools like GitHub Actions, Jenkins, or similar.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "DEVOPS-1-2", "title": "Automate Build & Test", "description": "Write scripts for automated build and test execution.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "DEVOPS-1-3", "title": "Automate Deployment", "description": "Configure deployment to staging and production environments.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "QA-8", "title": "End-to-End Testing", "description": "As a QA engineer, I want to ensure the app works as expected by running comprehensive end-to-end tests.", "acceptance_criteria": ["All core user flows are tested", "Critical bugs are identified and fixed before release", "Regression suite is automated"], "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "QA-8-1", "title": "Write E2E Test Cases", "description": "Develop test cases for all user flows.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-8-2", "title": "Automate E2E Tests", "description": "Implement automated E2E tests using Cypress or Selenium.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-8-3", "title": "Bug Fix Verification", "description": "Verify fixes for all critical bugs found.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "FE-9", "title": "Performance Optimization", "description": "As a user, I want the app to load within 3 seconds so I can access my tasks quickly.", "acceptance_criteria": ["App loads within 3 seconds on standard broadband", "All assets are optimized for size and speed", "No blocking scripts or resources"], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "FE-9-1", "title": "Optimize Frontend Assets", "description": "Minify JS/CSS, compress images, and implement lazy loading.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-9-2", "title": "Analyze and Improve Load Time", "description": "Use tools like Lighthouse to identify and fix performance bottlenecks.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-9-1", "title": "Performance Testing", "description": "Test app load time on various devices and networks.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "IT-1", "title": "Production Deployment & Monitoring", "description": "As an IT admin, I want the app deployed to a reliable hosting environment with monitoring so that uptime and issues can be tracked.", "acceptance_criteria": ["App is deployed to production hosting", "Monitoring and alerting are set up", "Downtime is tracked and reported"], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "IT-1-1", "title": "Provision Hosting Environment", "description": "Set up cloud or on-prem hosting for the app.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "IT-1-2", "title": "Deploy Application", "description": "Deploy the app to the production environment.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "IT-1-3", "title": "Configure Monitoring & Alerts", "description": "Set up monitoring tools and alerting for uptime and errors.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}]}], "total_estimated_hours": 160, "timeline_weeks": 6}
